p: MEAM1and MED are the most abundant whiteflies across china and in many other countries ( De Barro et al., 2010). In this study, we conducted laboratory experiments to compare the transmission and acquisition ability of CLCuMuV by the invasive cryptic species MEAM1, MED, and the indigenous Asia II 7 B.Â tabaci complex in the Gossypium hirsutum. The data can contribute to broader knowledge on whitefly begomovirus transmission and can help us in devising effective control strategies against CLCuD.
